prompt: Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. Modesty doesn't become me. 2. I am essentially a modest person.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. The thought of ruling the world frightens the hell out of me. 2. If I ruled the world it would be a better place.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I can usually talk my way out of anything. 2. I try to accept the consequences of my behavior.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I prefer to blend in with the crowd. 2. I like to be the center of attention.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I like to have authority over other people. 2. I don't mind following orders.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I try not to be a show off. 2. I will usually show off if I get the chance.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. Compliments embarrass me. 2. I like to be complimented.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I have a strong will to power. 2. Power for its own sake doesn't interest me.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I really like to be the center of attention. 2. It makes me uncomfortable to be the center of attention.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I can live my life in any way I want to. 2. People can't always live their lives in terms of what they want.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. People sometimes believe what I tell them. 2. I can make anybody believe anything I want them to.
Choose the choice that fits you best. 1. I get upset when people don't notice how I look when I go out in public. 2. I don't mind blending into the crowd when I go out in public.
